action_output_list: The user wants to create a new event in Simple Calendar Pro. The first step is to open the app.{"action_type": "open_app", "app_name": "Simple Calendar Pro"}
The user wants to create a new event. The "New Event" button is visible and clickable.{"action_type": "click", "index": 69}

The user wants to create a new event with the title 'Meeting'. The current screen is the event creation screen. The next step is to input the title of the event.{"action_type": "input_text", "text": "Meeting", "index": 8}
The next step is to input the location of the event.{"action_type": "click", "index": 18}

The user needs to input the location of the event. The location field is currently selected, so the next step is to input the location "Conference Room".{"action_type": "input_text", "text": "Conference Room", "index": 17}
The next step is to input the description of the event. The description field is visible on the screen.{"action_type": "click", "index": 19}
The user has clicked on the description field and now needs to input the description 'Discuss project progress'.{"action_type": "input_text", "text": "Discuss project progress", "index": 19}
The user needs to set the date to March 31 (Mon). The current date is October 21 2023 (Sat). So, I need to click on the date field to change the date.{"action_type": "click", "index": 24}
The current screen shows the calendar view. To navigate to March 2024, I need to click the "Next month" button multiple times.{"action_type": "click", "index": 49}
The current screen shows the calendar for November 2023. To reach March 2024, I need to click the "Next month" button multiple times.{"action_type": "click", "index": 48}

The current screen shows the calendar for December 2023. To reach March 2024, I need to navigate forward by multiple months. Clicking the "Next month" button will advance the calendar to the next month.{"action_type": "click", "index": 49}
The current screen shows the calendar for January 2024. To reach March 2024, I need to click the "Next month" button twice.{"action_type": "click", "index": 49}
The current screen shows the calendar for February 2024. To reach March 31, 2024, I need to click the "Next month" button to advance to March.{"action_type": "click", "index": 47}
